name: The Amazingly Average Adventures of Arnold the Disembodied Head
name_original: The Amazingly Average Adventures of Arnold the Disembodied Head
description:
This is a text adventure for the obscure 80's microcomputer, the COMX-35.

Spanning 2336 lines of BASIC code, this game passes the memory limit of the COMX and has to be split up into Side A & B, in pure game-on-a-tape fashion.

The game is about Arnold, a disembodied head living an average life, making "adventures" out of something like just going to the bank or the grocery store. In one eventful day, this is quite the adventure by his standards.

Made for the Floppy Jam.

The source code can be found online here:

Side A: https://pastebin.com/meU7ZnRn

Side B: https://pastebin.com/3g4vUsxT

This game was developed on The Okey Collective, a Discord ran by me with several amateur game makers! Check it out here: https://discord.gg/A7RjWgy
